trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, represents a data store for writing and reading user annotations.
trans-unit.target: Representerer et datalager for skriving og lese bruker merknader når overstyres i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref> to the store.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en ny <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"> </xref> til butikken.

trans-unit.source: When a new <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> is added to the store its [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A> property is set to a new value.
trans-unit.target: Når en ny <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>er lagt til i lageret den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A>egenskapen er satt til en ny verdi.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>

trans-unit.source: When AddAnnotation is called, its <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A> property is checked to see if the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> already has been added to the store.
trans-unit.target: Når AddAnnotation kalles, den <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A>egenskapen er merket for å se om det <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>er allerede lagt til butikken.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> already has been added and exists in the store (as determined by its <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A> property) an <xref:System.ArgumentException> error is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>allerede er lagt til, og finnes i butikken (i henhold den <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A>egenskapen) en <xref:System.ArgumentException>feil har oppstått.</xref:System.ArgumentException> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>

trans-unit.source: The annotation to add to the store.
trans-unit.target: Merknaden for å legge til butikken.

trans-unit.source: newAnnotation is .
trans-unit.target: newAnnotationis .

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref> with the same <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*> property value already exists in the store.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"> </xref> med samme <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>egenskapsverdien finnes allerede i lageret.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> has been called on the store.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>ble kalt i lageret.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an anchor on any <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref> in the store changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når forankring noen <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"> </xref> store endringer.

trans-unit.source: The AnchorChanged event can be used to monitor changes to the annotation <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A> contained in the store without the need to register on each <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> individually.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen AnchorChanged kan brukes til å overvåke endringer merknaden <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A>i butikken uten å måtte registrere seg på hver <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>enkeltvis.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an author on any <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref> in the store changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en forfatter noen <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"> </xref> store endringer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AnchorChanged> event can be used to monitor changes to the annotation <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Authors%2A> contained in the store without the need to register on each <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> individually.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AnchorChanged>hendelsen kan brukes til å overvåke endringer merknaden <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Authors%2A>i butikken uten å måtte registrere seg på hver <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>enkeltvis.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Authors%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AnchorChanged>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether data in annotation buffers is to be written immediately to the physical data store.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om dataene i merknad bufferne er skrives umiddelbart til fysisk datalageret.

trans-unit.source: Applications that use an explicit-save model can set AutoFlush to `false` and call <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A> directly when appropriate.
trans-unit.target: Programmer som bruker en eksplisitt Lagre modell kan angi AutoFlush til `false` og kall <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A>direkte når behov.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A>

trans-unit.source: Applications that use an implicit-save model can set AutoFlush to `true` to cause <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A> to be called automatically after every store operation (add, delete, or modify).
trans-unit.target: Programmer som bruker en implisitt Lagre modell kan angi AutoFlush til `true` kan forårsake <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A>kalles automatisk etter hver store-operasjon (legge til, slette eller endre).</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data in annotation buffers is to be written immediately to the physical data store for each operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if data in the annotation buffers is to be written when the application explicitly calls <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis dataene i merknad buffere skrives umiddelbart til fysisk datalageret for hver operasjonen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis dataene i merknad bufferne skrives når programmet eksplisitt kaller <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush*>.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cargo on any <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref> in the store changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en Transportnett noen <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"> </xref> store endringer.

trans-unit.source: The CargoChanged event can be used to monitor changes to the annotation <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A> contained in the store without the need to register on each <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> individually.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen CargoChanged kan brukes til å overvåke endringer merknaden <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A>i butikken uten å måtte registrere seg på hver <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>enkeltvis.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Deletes the annotation with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*> from the store.
trans-unit.target: Sletter merknaden med angitt <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>fra butikken.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*> property of the annotation to be deleted.
trans-unit.target: Den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>for merknaden som skal slettes.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>

trans-unit.source: The annotation that was deleted; otherwise, if an annotation with the specified annotationId was not found in the store.
trans-unit.target: Merknaden som ble slettet; Ellers om en merknad med angitt annotationId ble ikke funnet i lageret.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> has been called on the store.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>ble kalt i lageret.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Releases all managed and unmanaged resources used by the store.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle behandlet ressursene som brukes av butikken.

trans-unit.source: Applications should call Dispose when finished with the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>.
trans-unit.target: Programmer kan kontakte avhending når <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> er fullført

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose the application can release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> to allow the garbage collector to reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Etter å avhending kan programmet Frigi alle referanser til den <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>å tillate saneringsoppsamlingen for gjenvinning minnet som den <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>ble bruker.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [Rydder opp uforvaltede ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [implementere metoden fjerne](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The public Dispose method calls the protected <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>`(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter of `true` to release all managed and unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: Offentlig fjerningsmetoden kaller beskyttede <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> `(Boolean)` metoden med den `disposing` -parameteren for `true` Frigi alle behandlet ressurser.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Call Dispose before the last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> is released.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Kall fjerne før den siste referansen til det <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>er utgitt.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>

trans-unit.source: If Dispose is not called, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> resources will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the store's <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis avhending ikke kalles, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>ressurser vil ikke bli frigjort før saneringsoppsamlingen kaller butikkens <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Finalize%2A>metode.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the store and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av store og frigir eventuelt administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: This protected Dispose method is called by the public <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>and <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Dette beskyttet avhending-metoden av offentlig <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>og <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: The public <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> invokes the protected Dispose`(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Offentligheten <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>aktiverer beskyttede avhending`(Boolean)` metoden med den `disposing` parameteren satt til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes Dispose with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>Aktiverer avhending med `disposing` satt til `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, Dispose releases all resources held by any managed objects that the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> references.
trans-unit.target: Når den `disposing` parameteren er `true`, avhending versjoner alle ressurser holdes av en administrert objekter som den <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>referanser.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>

trans-unit.source: Dispose also invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Avhending også aktiverer den `Dispose()` metode for hver referert objekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Guarantees that <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> will eventually be called for this store.
trans-unit.target: Garanterer som <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>vil til slutt kalles for denne butikken.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: This method overrides base <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden overstyrer base <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metode.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The application program should not call Finalize directly.
trans-unit.target: Programmet kan ikke kalle Fullfør direkte.

trans-unit.source: Finalize is automatically invoked during garbage collection unless disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Fullfør aktiveres automatisk under datasanering Hvis deaktivert som et kall til den <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>metoden.</xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [fullføre metoder og destruktører](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Rydder opp uforvaltede ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), og [overstyrer metoden fullføre](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Forces any annotation data retained in internal buffers to be written to the underlying storage device.
trans-unit.target: Tvinger merknadsdata beholdes i interne bufferne skrives til den underliggende lagringsenheten.

trans-unit.source: Applications that use an explicit-save model can set <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A> to `false` and call Flush directly when appropriate.
trans-unit.target: Programmer som bruker en eksplisitt Lagre modell kan angi <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A>til `false` og kall tømming direkte om nødvendig.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A>

trans-unit.source: Applications that use an implicit-save model can set the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A> to `true` to cause Flush to be called automatically after every store operation (add, delete, or modify).
trans-unit.target: Programmer som bruker en implisitt Lagre modell kan angi den <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A>til `true` kan forårsake tømming kalles automatisk etter hver store-operasjon (legge til, slette eller endre).</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> has been called on the store.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>ble kalt i lageret.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the annotation with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*> from the store.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en merknad med angitt <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>fra butikken.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*> property of the annotation to be returned.
trans-unit.target: Den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>for merknaden som skal returneres.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>

trans-unit.source: The annotation with the given annotationId; or , if an annotation with the specified annotationId was not found in the store.
trans-unit.target: Merknaden med den angitte annotationId ; eller , hvis en merknad med angitt annotationId ble ikke funnet i lageret.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> has been called on the store.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>ble kalt i lageret.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all the annotations in the store.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en liste over alle merknader i butikken.

trans-unit.source: The list of all annotations currently contained in the store.
trans-unit.target: Liste over alle merknader i butikken.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> has been called on the store.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>ble kalt i lageret.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of annotations that have <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors*> with locators that begin with a matching <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart"></xref> sequence.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en liste over merknader som har <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors*>med adresser som begynner med en tilsvarende <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart"> </xref> sekvens.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors*>

trans-unit.source: This GetAnnotations method internally uses the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator.StartsWith%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> class to search and match for the annotations to return.
trans-unit.target: Da GetAnnotations internt brukes av <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator.StartsWith%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator>klassen vil søke etter for merknader skal returneres.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator.StartsWith%2A>

trans-unit.source: The starting <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart"></xref> sequence to return matching annotations for.
trans-unit.target: Start <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart"> </xref> sekvensen til å returnere samsvarende merknader for.

trans-unit.source: The list of annotations that have with locators that start and match the given anchorLocator; otherwise, if no matching annotations were found.
trans-unit.target: Listen over merknader som har med adresser som begynner og samsvarer med den angitte anchorLocator ; ellers Hvis ingen samsvarende merknader ble funnet.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> has been called.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>er blitt kalt.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> has been called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>er kall; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AnchorChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AnchorChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AuthorChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AuthorChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.CargoChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.CargoChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.StoreContentChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.StoreContentChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref> is added to or deleted from the store.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"> </xref> legges til eller slettet fra butikken.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object to use as a synchronization lock for <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"></xref> critical sections.
trans-unit.target: Henter objektet som skal brukes som synkronisering låsing for <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"> </xref> kritiske deler.

trans-unit.source: The object to use as a synchronization lock for <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"></xref> critical sections.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som skal brukes som synkronisering låsing for <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"> </xref> kritiske deler.
